SEO_TITLE: ESLAND Awards 2024 - Celebrating the best of streaming and content creators
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the best content creators from Spain, Latin America, and Andorra. Vote for your favorites and celebrate the innovation and talent of Twitch, YouTube, and more.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: While the film industry has the Oscars and the music industry has the Grammys, streaming has the ESLAND Awards. These awards celebrate the creativity and talent of the best content creators from the Spanish-speaking community.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Spain, Latin America, and Andorra come together for creators and their communities to reminisce and relive some of the best moments of the year.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: After two celebrated events, one at the Palau de la MÃºsica Catalana in Barcelona and another at the National Auditorium in Mexico City, we eagerly await the third edition in Andorra.
BENTO_1_TITLE: Andorra: The Zenith of the Esland Awards
BENTO_1_DESCRIPTION: A new edition loaded with novelties and content, starting several weeks before the highly anticipated gala. Special live streams, collaborations, concerts, and much more in what will be a true celebration dedicated to content creation.
BENTO_2_DESCRIPTION: This year, the moment of the blue carpet will be replaced and enhanced, thanks to the incredible Andorran landscapes, by a white carpet in the snow, located on the ski slopes of Andorra.
BENTO_3_DESCRIPTION: An awards gala filled with top-notch content and many surprises, where the winners of this third edition of the ESLAND Awards will be revealed.
BENTO_4_DESCRIPTION: This year, Reddit will not be part of the award voting, but it will be part of the community. The official ESLAND Awards subreddit is open for you to share your clips, opinions, and to interact with the entire Spanish-speaking streaming community.
